reasoning_steps: Step 1: Sourced top-holder share counts, market values, portfolio weights, and ownership percentages from Simply Wall St’s Apple ownership table (data last updated 2026/01/12 UTC per the page). Used Fintel as a secondary source to corroborate the identity of major holders.

Step 2: Ranked holders by Shares Held (descending) and selected the top 15 entries; populated rows 2-16 of the Holders sheet with Investor, Shares Held, Market Value ($), % of Portfolio, and % Ownership (as decimals to match the sheet’s percent formats).

Step 3: Validated that only the Holders sheet was modified and that exactly 15 rows were filled. Note: headless LibreOffice recalculation could not be performed in this environment because the LibreOffice/soffice binary is not available.
